lead_paragraph: Patrick Kane had a goal and two assists and Tim Thomas made 24 saves to help the United States beat Latvia, 4-0, on Friday night in the team’s opening preliminary-round game in the world championship in Halifax, Nova Scotia. In earlier games, Dany Heatley had three goals and an assist to help Canada, the defending champion, beat Slovenia, 5-1. In Quebec City, the Czech Republic beat Denmark, 5-2, and Russia defeated Italy, 7-1.
